tech_news.title: Total War: Medieval 3 Announced as the 'Rebirth of Historical Total War,' New Total War Game to Be Revealed at The Game Awards - IGN
tech_news.description: Creative Assembly has announced Total War: Medieval 3, the next mainline game in its strategy series.

tech_news.title: Amazon’s new color Kindle Scribe launches on December 10th - The Verge
tech_news.description: Amazon’s new Kindle Scribe Colorsoft and Kindle Scribe will be available to purchase starting December 10th.

tech_news.title: Nintendo Today! datamining leads to speculation concerning Mario Kart World DLC and a certain Donkey Kong character - GoNintendo
You Probably Won't Guess What Just Outsold Every PS5 And Xbox Console Model In The US - GameSpot
tech_news.description: Motion controls are having a moment.

tech_news.title: After being delayed, delayed, and then delayed again, Cyberpunk platformer Replaced finally gets a release date - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Replaced, the cyberpunk action-platformer from Belarusian developer Sad Cat Studio, finally has a release date and is set to arrive on PC and Xbox Series X/S.

tech_news.title: Sideloading apps on Android 16 QPR2 has a much nicer-looking UI - Android Authority
tech_news.description: Google has redesigned the sideloading UI in Android 16 QPR2 to have a more modern, Material 3 Expressive design. Here's what it looks like!

tech_news.title: Rereleased after 43 years, this infamous Atari 2600 game is a brutalist take on Pac-Man - AV Club
tech_news.description: Both a best-seller and infamous, industry-shaking failure, Pac-Man's Atari 2600 port was recently rereleased for the first--and second--times.

tech_news.title: New AirTag accessory extends battery life to 5+ years - 9to5Mac
tech_news.description: My favorite AirTag accessory is the TimeCapsule battery case, and now its follow-up is here with 5 years of battery in a more compact size.

tech_news.title: Horror game Horses removed from multiple storefronts as censorship scare continues - AV Club
tech_news.description: The horror game Horses has been banned from multiple digital storefronts, like Steam, for vague, ill-defined reasons.
